016package tech.uom.seshat;

018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Collections;
022import java.util.HashMap;
023import java.util.Locale;
024import java.util.Objects;
025import java.text.Format;
026import java.text.FieldPosition;
027import java.text.ParsePosition;
028import java.text.ParseException;
029import java.util.ResourceBundle;
030import java.util.MissingResourceException;
031import java.util.ConcurrentModificationException;
032import java.io.IOException;
033import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
034import javax.measure.Dimension;
035import javax.measure.Unit;
036import javax.measure.format.ParserException;
037import tech.uom.seshat.math.Fraction;
038import tech.uom.seshat.math.MathFunctions;
039import tech.uom.seshat.resources.Errors;
040import tech.uom.seshat.util.Characters;
041import tech.uom.seshat.util.CharSequences;
042import tech.uom.seshat.util.WeakValueHashMap;
